timeline.bodyText: Is this related to the topic of this PR - "Added dmn-drools-springboot-metrics example"?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText: Nope, it is just to remove the warning from the log, I don't know if it makes sense to have a independent PR just for this
replies.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Can you please provide more info about why is this test failing?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
This example is a carbon copy of the existing dmn-drools-quarkus-metrics that is currently disabled on master ( see link ).
@r00ta is fixing it and re-enabling with this PR
#495
and then I can apply the same changes.
🤔 I think it is better to wait @r00ta PR to be merged before this one so I can enable the test. Wdyt?
replies.author: danielezonca
